content:
path /v3/algorand/address/priv
operationid algorandgenerateaddress
parameters
description private key of wallet
in path
name priv
required true
schema
type string
summary generate algorand account address from private key
description 1 credit per api call
generate algorand account deposit address from private key
responses
200
schema
type object
address
type string
description algorand address
description ok
tag_summary:
algorand is a decentralized blockchain technology network algorand is enabling the simple creation of next generation financial products protocols and exchange of value across defi financial institutions and governments
tatum supports 2 chains
mainnet  a regular live chain
testnet  a chain used for testing purposes coins on the test chain have no value and can be obtained from
a faucet eg https//banktestnetalgorandnetwork/
examples of working with the algorand blockchain can be found in tatum algo sdk
title: 1_Algorand_AlgorandGenerateAddress_15.json
